PLNmodels 0.5.9001

Reference

Top-level fitting functions

Set of functions to fit variants of the Poisson lognormal model

PLN()

Poisson lognormal model

PLNLDA()

Poisson lognormal model towards Linear Disciminant Analysis

PLNPCA()

Poisson lognormal model towards Principal Component Analysis

PLNnetwork()

Poisson lognormal model towards sparse network inference

Representation of the Poisson lognormal fit

Class and methods associated to the PLNfit object. Any PLN variant in the packake inherits from this class (PLNPCAfit, PLNnetworkfit, PLNLDAfit).

PLNfit

An R6 Class to represent a PLNfit in a standard, general framework

plot(<PLNfit>)

Display the model parameters of a PLNfit in a matrix fashion

coef(<PLNfit>)

Extracts model coefficients from objects returned by PLN and its variants

vcov(<PLNfit>)

Extracts model covariance from objects returned by PLN and its variants

predict(<PLNfit>)

Predict counts of a new sample

Representation of a Linear discriminant analysis under the PLN distribution

Class and methods associated to the PLNLDAfit object.

PLNLDAfit

An R6 Class to represent a PLNfit in a LDA framework

PLNLDAfit_plot_LDA

Plot a summary of the current PLNLDAfit object

PLNLDAfit_plot_correlation_circle

Plot the correlation circle of a specified axis for a PLNLDAfit object

PLNLDAfit_plot_individual_map

Plot the individual map of a specified axis for a PLNLDAfit object

predict(<PLNLDAfit>)

Predict group of new samples

Class for PLN PCA fit and methods

Class and methods associated to the PLNPCAfit object.

PLNPCAfit

An R6 Class to represent a PLNfit in a PCA framework

PLNPCAfit_plot_PCA

Plot a summary of the current PLNPCAfit object

PLNPCAfit_plot_correlation_circle

Plot the correlation circle of a specified axis for a PLNPCAfit object

PLNPCAfit_plot_individual_map

Plot the individual map of a specified axis for a PLNPCAfit object

PLNPCAfamily

An R6 Class to represent a collection of PLNPCAfit

plot(<PLNPCAfamily>)

Display the criteria associated with a collection of PLNPCA fits (a PLNPCAfamily)

Class for PLN network fit and methods

Class and methods associated to the PLNnetworkfit object.

PLNnetworkfit

An R6 Class to represent a PLNfit in a sparse inverse covariance framework

PLNnetworkfamily

An R6 Class to represent a collection of PLNnetworkfit

plot(<PLNnetworkfamily>)

Display the criteria associated with a collection of PLNnetwork fits (a PLNnetworkfamily)

coefficient_path

Extract the regularization path of a PLNnetwork fit

stability_selection

Compute the stability path by stability selection

plot_network

Plot the network (support of the inverse covariance) for a PLNnetworkfit object

Other functions

rPLN()

PLN RNG

Data set

trichoptera

Trichoptera data set
